Your Team

(pageData) => { pageArr = []; for (i = 0; i < pageData.length; i++) { const employee = pageData[i]; const employeeRole = employee.getRole(); if (employeeRole === manager) { const managerCard = createManagerCard(employee); PageArr.push(managerCard); } if (employeeRole === engineer) { const engineerCard = createEngineerCard(employee); PageArr.push(engineerCard); } if (employeeRole === Intern) { const internCard = createInternCard(employee); PageArr.push(internCard); } } const allEmployeeCards = pageArr.join('') const generateEmployees = generateHTMLPage(allEmployeeCards); return generateEmployees; }
